cleanup_intermediate_files_irods_extract.help_text: delete intermediate CRAM files downloaded from IRODS in work/ folder

preexisting_fastq_tag.help_text:
if the expected ouput fastq files exist in the folder named like this under the result folder for the sample e.g. in results/12345_1#67/raw_fastq/12345_1#67_1.fastq.gz,
            then skip download and any further processing for this sample.

split_sep_for_ID_from_fastq.help_text: separator to recognise sample ID from preexisting file.

metadata_only.help_text:
Should this pipeline only return the metadata CSV table of files matching the query on iRODS i.e. do not download any data.
            This is useful for prior check of query scope when attempting bold queries based on loose criteria e.g. using the `sample_common_name` (species/taxon name).
